objectives: Students will discuss health and fitness using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Thriller/Suspense themed scenarios related to health and fitness
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining health and fitness content with Thriller/Suspense narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore health and fitness through a Thriller/Suspense lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dangerous or threatening situation involving health and fitness

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to health and fitness in a thriller context
Students engage in thriller themed role-play about health and fitness using slang register
Students create original thriller themed content about health and fitness in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe health and fitness in a Thriller/Suspense scenario?
What suspense or threat might be involved in health and fitness?
Can you create a Thriller/Suspense story about health and fitness?
How does health and fitness change when viewed through a Thriller/Suspense perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this thriller scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Thriller/Suspense situation involving health and fitness
roles: Character A: Using slang register in thriller context
Character B: Responding in slang register within thriller theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Thriller/Suspense theme: Tension, danger, psychological intensity

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Thriller/Suspense themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
